name: RN apps: Invalid username error
precondition: Run these tests on https://mysql.test.mattermost.com/

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P4 - Low-Impact (Edge or unsuitable to repeat?)

inline.description:
RN - Invalid username error
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Must be logged in using email + password
  2. Tap the three-dot menu in the top right of your screen
  3. Tap your profile info / pic to open Edit screen
  4. Scroll down to "Username" and add "+new" at the end (make sure to include the plus sign)
  5. Tap "Save"
inline.expectedResult: • A correctly formatted error message "Username must begin with a letter, and contain between 3 to 22 lowercase characters made up of numbers, letters, and the symbols ".", "-", and "_"."
